Q.11. FROM WHAT YOU HAVE SEEN, HOW WELL DO YOU FEEL THAT HIGHER HEADQUARTERS (WING, DIVISION, 8TH AIR FORCE HQ) UNDERSTAND YOUR PROBLEMS AND NEEDS*  1. I FEEL THAT THEY ARE VERY MUCH AWARE OF OUR NEEDS 2. I FEEL THAT THEY ARE FAIRLY WELL AWARE OF OUR NEEDS 3. I FEEL THAT THEY DON,T KNOW VERY MUCH ABOUT OUR REAL PROBLEMS AND NEEDS 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 11A NOT CODED.

Q.12. DO YOU THINK YOU HAVE THE BEST TYPE OF AIRPLANE FOR THE PARTICULAR JOB WHICH YOU HAVE TO DO* IF NO, WHAT TYPE OF PLANE DO YOU THINK WOULD BE BETTER*  1. NO, SPECIFIES B-17, FORT, ETC. 2. NO, SPECIFIES B-24, LIBERATOR, ETC. 3. NO SPECIFIES B-29 4. NO, SPECIFIES ANY OTHER TYPE OF PLANE (OTHER THAN B-17, B-24 OR B-29) 5. NO, SPECIFIES LATER MODEL OF SOME PLANE (E.G. 17-G, ETC.) 6. NO, DOES NOT SPECIFY 7. YES 8. UNCERTAIN 0. NO ANSWER
